name: Tim Benz
coverLetter: My experience is as a personal use grower for the last 30 years.Ive grown my own weed in areas from Oregon to So Calif germanating,cultivating and harvesting anywhere from one  up to twenty plants.Im reliable and trustworthy and eager to work now.This is a career change for me as Im a semi retired carpenter/contractor looking to become a master cultivator and i love handling product in all stages of its growth.I consider myself to be a master at trimming bud just never on a large quantity situation and im open to any and all positions available within the industry where i may be a good fit.Im not a heavy user although i was at one time my age and maturity have tamed me to a more responsible user interested in all aspects of this new and exciting industry starting from the bottom and anywehere i may fit best
